alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gilmer, Murray, Whitfield, southeastern Walker, northwestern Gordon and northwestern Fannin Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Dawnville, or near Chatsworth, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Chatsworth, Varnell, Eton, Resaca, Crandall, Sumac, Ramhurst, Gregory, Cohutta Wilderness, Tilton, Conasauga Lake, Tennga, Beaverdale, Dawnville, Cisco, Sugar Valley, Fort Mountain State Park, Nickelsville and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield
